name: com.mephistophas.tools
description:
This package allows you to automatically create your base folders for any game you are making in unity. This version creates a '_Project' folder and inside it, a folder for each of these: 'Scripts', 'Art', 'Scenes','Sounds'. Then in the 'Art' folder there is an 'Animations' and a 'Sprites' folder

In this version I have added my personal basic file settings instead of the ones above. Highly recommendable if you want to use them to use UI Toolkit and UI Builder
I have also added an 'elaborate folders' option though it's not too elaborate since it is meant to be only for basic folders
